fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Call down divine lightning, rampaging at all Striked players' houses. For every non-Striked player you kill, you gain one Strike to use.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When placing a Strike, all players who target you will have their ability fail.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you gain basic defense.
